channel.title: Question with my pure
channel.description: i got 42 range 25 mage and 31 hp. well should i get 40 atk and 50 str? then get 60 range? then i could do this r2h thing. should i? or will the just ruin my range pure>??

item.title: Question with my pure
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

There is a trade off of course between combat level and HP and of course most people will urge you to get as much HP as possible, however it is good to go all the way in either direction. Either avoid getting any extra HP (quests, dummies, curses, PC points, other tricks etc…) or get as much as possible all the time (certain spells, avoid quest XP, PC points, etc… ). Of course what combat styles will you actually be using in the wildy and hence levelling up? This is the important question. You should decide this based on what is fun for you and what you are good at using in combat, not based on what HP you want or what people tell you to do or how you think it might make your pure turn out.

Read full topic

item.title: Question with my pure
item.dc:creator: @allserversuck allserversuck
item.description:
@allserversuck wrote:

i wont ruin it, infact it’d probably be good becuase youll get more hp. but you should get 70 range sometime

item.title: Question with my pure
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“zoltanman, post:12, topic:110026”][quote author=1337h4x link=topic=157280.msg1482798#msg1482798 date=1181792544]

attack and str will ruin it, right now, I think you should just get 60 range. Then pk/money make for training runes and lvl till you reach fire bolt, or wind blast. (haven’t been on in a while, but I’m pretty sure bolt is the second cycle of missiles?)

i see what you mean and i dont want to get combat involved.

and mr.chris, i might do this but very low chances
[/quote]felix, I know guys on crack that are smarter then zoltanman.

Get 50 - 60 range. Get 40 atk, 50 str. Pk with r2h. If you are good you will own, just like

EDIT: Snaring in f2p? Rofl. I guess it’s true that your rank reflects your knowledge :rolleyes:

Oh I’m so sorry I made a P2p F2p mistake… Bind, happy?[/quote]
nice lol. i think im just gonna have high range and mage, no combat.

Read full topic

Get 50 - 60 range. Get 40 atk, 50 str. Pk with r2h. If you are good you will own, just like

EDIT: Snaring in f2p? Rofl. I guess it’s true that your rank reflects your knowledge :rolleyes:

yeah but then your higher in lvls with the combat involved…and zoltanman is a good community friend of mine -.-[/quote]Uhh you get a couple hp points, nothing wrong with that. The melee stats won’t affect you as long as you have high range. Plus hp is good, I have 50 hp on my lvl 42, people take out 2h’s on me when I have 20hp because it looks like I have low hp. Community friend or not, a mopar noob is always a noob.
